description_html: The BG Sconce [RC 24] from CL Sterling is composed of nuggets of recycled lead crystal that have been tumbled to remove sharp edges and then individually hand tied to a nickel plated brass frame using jeweler’s wire. 15.7” H x 9.5” W x 5” Projection. Accepts (4) 40W incandescent bulbs or equivalent. Approximately 22 lbs.
